param.name: id_list
param.label: A list of integer vectors specifying the identity of the cluster to which each window in each analysis belongs

param.name: olap_list
param.label: A list of Hits objects specifying the overlaps between windows of each analysis and a common set of pre-defined regions.

repeat.name: db
repeat.title: Upload dataframes containing the DB test results for each analysis.

param.name: weight_list
param.label: A list of numeric vectors specifying the weight of each window in id list or overlapping window in olap list.

param.name: fun
param.label: Specify how the statistics should be consolidated, returning a DataFrame with one row per cluster/region.
param.help: Select combineTests or combineOverlaps consolidate statistics. This will yield a single combined p-value for each cluster or region. Select getBestTest or getBestOverlaps to obtain the best windows in each cluster/region

param.name: reindex
param.label: Indicate which fields of the DataFrame returned should be reindexed.

tool.help: Consolidate DB statistics from analyses using multiple window sizes.
